statements: SELECT id, name, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT name, age FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM user_profiles ORDER BY name;
SELECT id, name, age, email, phone_number FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' OR phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 18 AND phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY age ASC, name ASC;
SELECT name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND age <= 30 ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT name, age FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM user_profiles JOIN contact_details ON user_profiles.user_id = contact_details.user_id;
SELECT name, age, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT user_id, phone_number, address FROM contact_details WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles JOIN contact_details ON user_profiles.user_id = contact_details.user_id;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age FROM user_profiles;
SELECT name, age, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age < 40 ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles
SELECT name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, contact_details FROM user_profiles WHERE name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM address ORDER BY zip_code DESC

SELECT user_profiles.name, address.city, phone_numbers.phone_number FROM user_profiles JOIN address ON user_profiles.user_id = address.user_id JOIN phone_numbers ON user_profiles.user_id = phone_numbers.user_id
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age, contact_details, street, city FROM user_profiles JOIN address ON user_profiles.user_id = address.user_id;
SELECT * FROM address WHERE city='New York';
SELECT user_id, name, phone_number FROM user_profiles JOIN phone_numbers ON user_profiles.user_id = phone_numbers.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT id, street, city, state, zipcode FROM addresses;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, e.degree, e.institution FROM users u JOIN education e ON u.id = e.user_id WHERE e.graduation_year = 2020;
SELECT u.first_name, COUNT(h.id) AS hobby_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN hobbies h ON u.id = h.user_id GROUP BY u.first_name;
SELECT u.first_name, u.email, a.street, a.city, a.zipcode FROM users u JOIN addresses a ON u.id = a.user_id WHERE a.city = 'San Francisco';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM user_profiles WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT user_id, hobby_name FROM hobbies ORDER BY hobby_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM user_profiles WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY email;
SELECT job_title, company, salary FROM jobs WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT university, degree, graduation_year FROM education WHERE graduation_year >= 2010 ORDER BY graduation_year;
SELECT name, age, email, phone_number, hobby_name FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN hobbies ON user_profiles.user_id = hobbies.user_id;
